name: getupdates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sms_receive.
Tool description: Integrate receiving SMS message into your apps and applications, enabling automation based on incoming text messages.

For a simple demonstration, see https://www.tomwimmenhove.com/sms/

API description: Fetch updates about newly received messages from the server, starting from a given message ID and optionally waiting for incoming messages for a specified time.

start_id.description: The ID from which to start fetching updates. Set to zero for the first call to retrieve all updates.

time_out.description: The time-out period (in seconds) for the server to wait for incoming messages before returning. Defaults to 0.
